original: yul gang du bzod pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yul de'i rgyal por 'gyur ba de'i slad bzhin du bdag cag 'brang zhing gnod pa las bskyab par bgyi'o //
analyzed: yul gang du bzod pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yul de'i rgyal por 'gyur ba de'i slad bzhin du bdag cag 'brang zhing gnod pa las bskyab par bgyi'o //
translated: We will follow the king of the land where this teaching of patience is explained, and we will protect him from harm.

original: bro nad zhi bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: bro nad zhi bar bgyi'o //
translated: We will cure his illnesses.

original: de'i tshe bskyang bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe bskyang bar bgyi'o //
translated: We will care for him at that time.

original: de dgra las bskyab par bgyi'o //
analyzed: de dgra las bskyab par bgyi'o //
translated: We will protect him from his enemies.

original: dpal dang skal pa bzang po dang chos la dga' ba nye bar bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: dpal dang skal pa bzang po dang chos la dga' ba nye bar bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: We will show him glory, good fortune, and delight in the Dharma.

original: stobs dang rtsal thags thogs ma mchis pa phun sum tshogs par bgyi'o //
analyzed: stobs dang rtsal thags thogs ma mchis pa phun sum tshogs par bgyi'o //
translated: We will perfect his strength and power without obstruction.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: bzhin bzang dag /
analyzed: bzhin bzang dag /
translated: ‚ÄúGood sirs,

original: legs so legs so //
analyzed: legs so legs so //
translated: excellent, excellent!

original: khyod ji skad smras pa bzhin du nyams su longs @420b shig /
analyzed: khyod ji skad smras pa bzhin du nyams su longs @420b shig /
translated: Practice as you have said.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar 'os dang ldan pa'i rgyal po yul gang du chos dang ldan par 'gyur bar bdag cag mdangs dang / stobs dang / gzi brjid dang / 'khor 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'os dang ldan pa'i rgyal po yul gang du chos dang ldan par 'gyur bar bdag cag mdangs dang / stobs dang / gzi brjid dang / 'khor 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Because in whatever land a worthy king becomes righteous, we will increase his radiance, strength, splendor, and retinue.‚Äù

original: de dag gis gsol pa /
analyzed: de dag gis gsol pa /
translated: They said:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: BhagavƒÅn,

original: de de lta lags te /
analyzed: de de lta lags te /
translated: it is so.

original: yul gang du bzod pa 'di rab tu 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yul de nga rgyal po'i zham ring ba dang / blon po rnams kyi yon tan dang / legs pa bzhi 'byung ste /
analyzed: yul gang du bzod pa 'di rab tu 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yul de nga rgyal po'i zham ring ba dang / blon po rnams kyi yon tan dang / legs pa bzhi 'byung ste /
translated: In whatever country this acceptance is explained, in that country four qualities of the king‚Äôs retinue and ministers will arise.

original: bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: bzhi gang zhe na /
translated: If it is asked what are the four, they are as follows:üîΩIn that country, the king‚Äôs retinue and ministers will mutually have acceptance, gentleness, joy, and a respectful mind.

original: yul der rgyal po'i zham ring ba dang / blon po rnams phan tshun bzod pa dang / des pa dang / dga' ba dang / gus pa'i sems su 'gyur ba dang / rgyal po'ang byams par 'gyur ba dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang /
analyzed: yul der rgyal po'i zham ring ba dang / blon po rnams phan tshun bzod pa dang / des pa dang / dga' ba dang / gus pa'i sems su 'gyur ba dang / rgyal po'ang byams par 'gyur ba dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang /
translated: The king will also be loving.

original: grong rdal gyi mi dang / ljongs kyi mi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyi yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / chos 'dod par 'gyur gyi rnyed pa mi 'dod de /
analyzed: grong rdal gyi mi dang / ljongs kyi mi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyi yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / chos 'dod par 'gyur gyi rnyed pa mi 'dod de /
translated: The minds of the monks, brahmins, and the men, women, boys, and girls of the city and the country will be pleased and delighted, and they will desire the Dharma, not desiring gain.

original: phyogs bcur grags pa'i sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa rgya cher grags shing tshe  ba dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba mang bar 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: phyogs bcur grags pa'i sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa rgya cher grags shing tshe  ba dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba mang bar 'gyur ba ste /
translated: the sound of their fame will spread in the ten directions, their verses will be widely renowned, and they will have much happiness, joy, and mental satisfaction.

original: yul gang du bzod pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba de ni /
analyzed: yul gang du bzod pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba de ni /
translated: In whatever country this patience is explained,

original: rgyal po'i zham ring ba dang / blon po rnams kyi yon tan dang bsngags par 'gyur ba ni /
analyzed: rgyal po'i zham ring ba dang / blon po rnams kyi yon tan dang bsngags par 'gyur ba ni /
translated: the king‚Äôs retinue and ministers will have good qualities and praise.

original: de dag go /
analyzed: de dag go /
translated: Those are the four.

original: gzhan yang yul gang du bzod pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yul der dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams kyi yon tan dang bsngags pa bzhi 'byung ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang yul gang du bzod pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yul der dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams kyi yon tan dang bsngags pa bzhi 'byung ste /
translated: Moreover, in whatever country this patience is explained, four good qualities and praises of the virtuous practitioners and brahmins will arise there.

original: @421a *// bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: @421a *// bzhi gang zhe na /
translated: What are the four?

original: yul der dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dag rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan byed pa la brtson par 'gyur ba dang / ri la mngon par dga' zhing rab tu dben par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: yul der dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dag rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan byed pa la brtson par 'gyur ba dang / ri la mngon par dga' zhing rab tu dben par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: In that land, ≈õrama·πáas and brahmins will obtain Dharma robes, alms, bedding, medicine for the sick, and other necessities. They will strive to practice meditation, delight in the mountains, and be completely secluded.

original: sems las byung ba'i bde ba bzhi la gnas pa rnyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems las byung ba'i bde ba bzhi la gnas pa rnyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will attain the four kinds of mental bliss.

original: yul gang du bzod pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yul de'i grong rdal dang ljongs kyi mi rnams kyi legs pa bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: yul gang du bzod pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yul de'i grong rdal dang ljongs kyi mi rnams kyi legs pa bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: ‚ÄúIn whatever land this acceptance is taught, four kinds of excellence will arise for the people of the towns and regions in that land.

original: bzhi gang zhe na; khron pa dang / chu mig dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / gnod pa med par 'gyur ba dang / las kyi mtha' grub par 'gyur ba dang / sbyin pa'i gnas snod du gyur pa rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: bzhi gang zhe na; khron pa dang / chu mig dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / gnod pa med par 'gyur ba dang / las kyi mtha' grub par 'gyur ba dang / sbyin pa'i gnas snod du gyur pa rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: What are the four? They will have wells and springs, they will be free from harm, they will accomplish their activities, and they will never be separated from those who are worthy recipients of generosity.

original: gzhan yang yul gang du bzod pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yul der bud med rnams kyi legs pa bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan yang yul gang du bzod pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yul der bud med rnams kyi legs pa bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: Moreover, in any place where this patience is explained, four good qualities will arise for the women there.

original: bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: bzhi gang zhe na /
translated: What are the four?

original: yul de'i bud med phrag dog dang khro ba rnam par spong bar 'gyur ba dang / skye bo thams cad la bzod par 'gyur ba dang / bu rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / nad nyung bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: yul de'i bud med phrag dog dang khro ba rnam par spong bar 'gyur ba dang / skye bo thams cad la bzod par 'gyur ba dang / bu rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / nad nyung bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The women in that place will give up jealousy and anger, they will be patient with all beings, they will obtain sons, and they will have few illnesses.

original: gzhan yang bud med gang bzod pa 'di nyan pa de la dad pa rnyed cing chos smra ba la phan pa zer ba de ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang bud med gang bzod pa 'di nyan pa de la dad pa rnyed cing chos smra ba la phan pa zer ba de ni /
translated: Moreover, any woman who listens to this patience and who finds faith in it and who says, ‚ÄúIt is beneficial to teach the Dharma,‚Äù

original: bud med du gyur pa'i tha ma yin te /
analyzed: bud med du gyur pa'i tha ma yin te /

original: snying po byang chub kyi bar du bud med thob @421b par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: snying po byang chub kyi bar du bud med thob @421b par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Until she reaches the site of awakening, she will not obtain a female body again.

original: gzhan du na bdag nyid kyis 'dod pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan du na bdag nyid kyis 'dod pa ni /

original: ma gtogs so //
analyzed: ma gtogs so //

original: gzhan yang yul gang du bzod pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba dag na gzhan gyi 'khor dang / nang gi 'khor gyis yul la gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang yul gang du bzod pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba dag na gzhan gyi 'khor dang / nang gi 'khor gyis yul la gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, in the country where this patience is taught, the retinue of others and the inner retinue will not harm the country.

original: char mi 'bab pa dang / mu ge 'byung ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / char dang / grang dro dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu mchu smyung dang / sbrang ma dang / byi ba dang / 'gro ba khro bo dang /

translated: There will be no lack of rain, famine, untimely wind, rain, cold, heat, flies, mosquitoes, bees, mice, angry beings,

original: sbrul khro bo dang / gcan gzan khro bo dang / ro bro ba med pa dang / rtsub pa dang / sre mo dang / mi bde bar reg pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gos dang / lcags sgrog dang / shing sgrog dang /
analyzed: sbrul khro bo dang / gcan gzan khro bo dang / ro bro ba med pa dang / rtsub pa dang / sre mo dang / mi bde bar reg pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gos dang / lcags sgrog dang / shing sgrog dang /

analyzed: dbyig pa dang / gshe ba dang / mi snyan par zer ba dang / rdeg pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / nad kyi gnod pa yul de na med par 'gyur ro //
translated: sticks, scolding, unpleasant speech, beating, untimely death, or harm from illness in that country.

original: lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dag gis kyang yul de shin tu srung zhing skyob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dag gis kyang yul de shin tu srung zhing skyob par 'gyur ro //
translated: gods, nƒÅgas, yak·π£as, asuras, and garu·∏ças will protect and guard that land.

original: rigs kyi bu dag /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dag /
translated: ‚ÄúNoble sons,

original: yul gang du yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di 'chad cing ston par 'gyur ba'i yul der gnod pa bcu po de dag gi yul thams cad mi gtse bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yul gang du yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di 'chad cing ston par 'gyur ba'i yul der gnod pa bcu po de dag gi yul thams cad mi gtse bar 'gyur ro //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Noble sons,

original: bzod pa 'di ni /
analyzed: bzod pa 'di ni /
translated: this discipline

analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo dag byang chub don du gnyer bar 'gyur ba de dag tu bzod pa 'di sgom pa dang / 'chad pa dang / ston pa dang / 'bri ba dang / klog pa dang / sgrog pa dang / spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: ‚ÄúThose sons and daughters of good family will strive for Awakening, and in the four continents, in the towns, countries, cities, villages, regions, and market towns, those sons and daughters of good family will strive for Awakening, and they will cultivate, teach, demonstrate, write, read, recite, and practice this acceptance.

original: bzod pa 'di gang na spyod pa der me tog bandu 'di spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bzod pa 'di gang na spyod pa der me tog bandu 'di spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Wherever this acceptance is practiced, there this flower of the coral tree will be practiced.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha dang / mi dang / @423a *//
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha dang / mi dang / @423a *//
translated: When the Lord had said this, the bodhisattvas who had come from the ten directions, the gods, the humans, the asuras, the gandharvas, and the world with its gods, humans, asuras, and gandharvas rejoiced.

original: lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'khor gyi 'jig rten thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rab tu dga' ste mngon par bstod do //
